QuestData.Title: Your Time Has Come
QuestData.Description: <A pleasant image fills your mind's eye as a calm voice echoes through your being.>$b$bYoung $c, be still and hear my words.$b$bI am called to collect you, to deliver you, to one whose eye none can escape.$b$bFind me in Orgrimmar, mortal, for your time has come.
QuestData.RewardText: Let us begin, mortal.$b$bThere is little time to spare.
